pullrequest.title: Fix camera view control inside bounding box of large meshes

content.raw: ya.. ray intersection is done with the mesh only if it passed the mouse picking test. In the case that didn't work, the mouse click was on the ground plane so the ray-intersection test is performed on the ground plane instead of the gazebo mesh.. not perfect
